short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to allow you to travel the world from the comfort of your home.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Worldly to travel virtually to over 20,000 different cities across the globe!  Click the globe and watch the highest ranked YouTube video for a random city on Earth.
